If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} has not attacked this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{uip|BonusArmour|8f5993cab35844cd8e0efbadc1c5dcbe}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
{g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g} and {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Slash{/g} do not affect this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

Применение Рывка или Рассечения не влияет на получение {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонуса{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If the Fighter has not attacked this turn, they gain +10+2×(TOU Bonus)% to Armour. Charge and Slice do not affect this bonus.
If the Fighter has not attacked this turn, they gain +10+2×(TGH Bonus)% to Armor. Charge and Slice do not affect this bonus.
If the Fighter has not attacked this turn, they gain +10+2×(TGH Bonus)% to Armour. Charge and Slice do not affect this bonus.

languages.text:
如果{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}在本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内没有进行过攻击，则{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}提高{uip|BonusArmour|8f5993cab35844cd8e0efbadc1c5dcbe}%。
